summary: A college teen named Rege slowly becomes engulfed in the criminal underworld when he crosses the path of a mysterious small-time gangster named "M Bhai".
cast: Neha Bam|Devendra Gaikwad|Avadhoot Gupte|Anant Jog|Vidyadhar Joshi|Santosh Juvekar|Prasad Kamat|Vijay Mane|Mahesh Manjrekar|Uday Sabnis|Pushkar Shrotri|Pravin Tarde|Aroh Velankar
keywords: character name as title|one word title|gangster|teenage boy|cop
title: Rege
